title: how workers catch Durian fruit naad how much they get?
description: These guys are catching durian fruit, and like I said before, it’s a pretty dangerous job. But today, let’s see how much they actually make doing it. So check this out: when the fruit drops from the tree, the worker waiting below has to catch it perfectly in one try. Even the tiniest mistake can send them straight to the hospital. That’s why they get paid so much. The person climbing the tree and tossing the durians makes around $1000 a day, while the catcher earns about $2500. Still, this risky work is a big deal for many people in some countries.
